page.title: 10Redditch New Hospital.
page.content: The{Bromsgrove and Redditch District {General Hospital}is being built to the {nucleus design,}the first phase of which will become fully operational in the summer of 1986.The nucleus design allows for further expansion in future years.The{population}served by the district will in{1986}total aproximately{166,429 increasing by {1990 to 174,488.}The hospital will provide an{Accident and Emergency {Department,four operating theatres,an {Xray Department and Rehabilitation {Department containing Speech Therapy, {Occupational Therapy and Chiropody. There will also be{387 Acute beds, including maternity,plus a{20 place {Special Care Baby Unit and 8 bedded {Intensive Care and Coronary Care {Units. Residents have helped equip the hospital by raising money for beds.
